name: unpacksdcmdir
description: A tool for unpacking SD card directories, typically used in neuroimaging workflows. It seems to have a dependency on Tcl, as indicated by the error messages.

inputs.description: The directory containing SD card data to be unpacked.
inputs.name: Input Directory

inputs.description: The output directory where unpacked data will be stored.
inputs.name: Output Directory

output-files.description: The directory that will contain the unpacked data.
output-files.name: Unpacked Data

author: FreeSurfer Developers
